short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the time calculation of your entry logs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your productive hours with precision by deducting breaks and other time-consuming tasks from your gross working hours using Keka's Time Logger. This powerful tool allows you to monitor your actual working hours and even calculates your exact leaving time through smart calculations.

If you find Keka's Time Logger helpful, please consider leaving a review to share your experience with others. Your feedback is greatly appreciated!
